Klingender; quoted in Ellis Waterhouse, Painting in Britain 1530 to 1790, Fourth Edition, New York, Viking Penguin, 1978; p. 285. Wright showed the contrast of light and dark. His paintings of early science in the English Midlands, show the Age of Enlightenment.
